function.name: merge_legal_documents
function.description: Merge multiple legal documents into a single PDF file. Maintains page numbering with gold footer style ('— 1 —'). Automatically generates an Exhibit Index page at the beginning.

document_ids.description: Array of document IDs to merge (in order)

document_urls.description: Alternative: Array of document URLs to merge (in order)

output_filename.description: Name for the merged output file (without extension)

include_exhibit_index.description: Whether to include an Exhibit Index page at the beginning

include_page_numbers.description: Whether to add sequential page numbers across all documents

header_footer_style.description: Header/footer style for page numbers. Style B: gold footer

merged_document_id.description: Unique identifier for the merged document

merged_document_url.description: URL to download the merged PDF

page_count.description: Total number of pages in the merged document
